text: Llandawke is a small settlement in Carmarthenshire, Wales, situated roughly 1 mile from Laugharne, toward Tenby.http://www.genuki.org.uk/big/wal/CMN/Llandawke It contains the now redunandant 13th century church of St Odoceus, which lay within the parish toward nearby Laugharne. ==See also== List of places in Carmarthenshire ==References== Category:Villages in Carmarthenshire
title: Llandawke
